verbose_text: These results suggest that in cultured EPCs, the synthesis of IL-6 and ICAM-1 is modulated by visfatin, and our data in agreement with those of a previous study, showing that visfatin enhances the expression of adhesion molecules (ICAM-1 and VCAM-1), as well as that of other inflammatory mediators through NF-kappaB activation in human endothelial cells.
evidence: visfatin enhances the expression of adhesion molecules (ICAM-1
